casebody.data:
No. 11-210. United States, Petitioner v. Xavier Alvarez. 565 U.S. 962, 132 S. Ct. 457,

181 L. Ed. 2d 292,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 7481. October 17, 2011.

Motion of respondent for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit granted.

Same case below, 617 F.3d 1198.
